00016 //----------------------------------------
00017 // COMEQ (Condition 0)
00018 //----------------------------------------
00019 
00021 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comeq_epi16_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00022 {
00023     a = _mm_cmpeq_epi16( a, b );
00024     return a;   
00025 }
00026 
00028 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comeq_epi32_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00029 {
00030     a = _mm_cmpeq_epi32( a, b );
00031     return a;   
00032 }
00033 
00035 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comeq_epi64_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00036 {
00037     ssp_m128 A, B;
00038     A.i = a;
00039     B.i = b;
00040     A.i = _mm_cmpeq_epi32( A.i, B.i );  //  A0=B0, A1=B1,  A2=B2, A3=B3
00041     B.i = _mm_slli_epi64 ( A.i, 32 );   //  A1=B1,     0,  A3=B3,     0
00042     A.i = _mm_and_si128  ( A.i, B.i );  //  A0=B0      x,  A2=B2,     x
00043                                         //& A1=B1,        &A3=B3  
00044 
00045     A.i = _mm_shuffle_epi32( A.i, _MM_SHUFFLE(3,3,1,1) );    
00046     
00047     return A.i;
00048 }
00049 
00051 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comeq_epi8_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00052 {
00053     a = _mm_cmpeq_epi8( a, b );
00054     return a;
00055 }

00139 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comlt_epi8_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00140 {
00141     a = _mm_cmplt_epi8( a, b );
00142     return a;
00143 }
00144 
00146 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comlt_epu16_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00147 {
00148     __m128i signMask, mask;
00149 
00150     mask     = _mm_cmplt_epi16( a, b );              // FFFF where a < b (signed)
00151     signMask = _mm_xor_si128  ( a, b );              // Signbit is 1 where signs differ 
00152     signMask = _mm_srai_epi16 ( signMask, 15 );      // fill all fields with sign bit     
00153     mask     = _mm_xor_si128  ( mask, signMask );    // Invert output where signs differed
00154     return mask;
00155 }
00156 
00158 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comlt_epu32_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00159 {
00160     __m128i signMask, mask;
00161 
00162     mask     = _mm_cmplt_epi32( a, b );              // FFFF where a < b (signed)
00163     signMask = _mm_xor_si128  ( a, b );              // Signbit is 1 where signs differ 
00164     signMask = _mm_srai_epi32 ( signMask, 31 );      // fill all fields with sign bit     
00165     mask     = _mm_xor_si128  ( mask, signMask );    // Invert output where signs differed
00166     return mask;
00167 }

00172     a = ssp_comlt_epu64_REF( a, b );
00173     return a;
00174 }

00216 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comle_epi16_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00217 {
00218     __m128i c;    
00219     c = _mm_cmplt_epi16( a, b );
00220     a = _mm_cmpeq_epi16( a, b );
00221     a = _mm_or_si128   ( a, c );
00222     return a;
00223 }
00224 
00226 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comle_epi32_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)

00230     a = _mm_cmpeq_epi32( a, b );
00231     a = _mm_or_si128   ( a, c );
00232     return a;
00233 }

00313 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128d ssp_comunord_pd_SSE2(__m128d a, __m128d b)
00314 {
00315     a = _mm_or_pd    ( a, b );
00316     a = _mm_cmpneq_pd( a, a );
00317     return a;   
00318 }
00319 
00321 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128 ssp_comunord_ps_SSE2(__m128 a, __m128 b)
00322 {
00323     a = _mm_or_ps    ( a, b );
00324     a = _mm_cmpneq_ps( a, a );
00325     return a;      
00326 }
00327 
00329 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128d ssp_comunord_sd_SSE2(__m128d a, __m128d b)
00330 {
00331     b = _mm_or_pd    ( a, b );
00332     a = _mm_cmpneq_sd( a, b );
00333     return a; 
00334 }
00335 
00337 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128 ssp_comunord_ss_SSE2(__m128 a, __m128 b)
00338 {
00339     b = _mm_or_ps    ( a, b );

00341     return a; 
00342 }

00350 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comneq_epi16_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00351 {
00352     a = ssp_comeq_epi16_SSE2( a, b );
00353     a = ssp_logical_invert_si128_SSE2( a );
00354     return a;   
00355 }

00540 //----------------------------------------
00541 // COMUEQ (Condition 8)
00542 //----------------------------------------
00543 
00545 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128d ssp_comueq_pd_SSE2(__m128d a, __m128d b)
00546 {
00547     __m128d c;
00548     c = _mm_cmpunord_pd( a, b );
00549     a = _mm_cmpeq_pd   ( a, b );
00550     a = _mm_or_pd      ( a, c );
00551     return a;   
00552 }
00553 
00555 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128 ssp_comueq_ps_SSE2(__m128 a, __m128 b)
00556 {
00557     __m128 c;
00558     c = _mm_cmpunord_ps( a, b );
00559     a = _mm_cmpeq_ps   ( a, b );
00560     a = _mm_or_ps      ( a, c );
00561     return a;   
00562 }
00563 
00565 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128d ssp_comueq_sd_SSE2(__m128d a, __m128d b)
00566 {
00567     __m128d c;
00568     c = _mm_cmpunord_sd( a, b );
00569     b = _mm_cmpeq_sd   ( a, b );
00570     b = _mm_or_pd      ( b, c );
00571     a = _mm_move_sd    ( a, b );
00572     return a;   
00573 }
00574 
00576 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128 ssp_comueq_ss_SSE2(__m128 a, __m128 b)
00577 {
00578     __m128 c;
00579     c = _mm_cmpunord_ss( a, b );
00580     b = _mm_cmpeq_ss   ( a, b );
00581     b = _mm_or_ps      ( a, c );
00582     a = _mm_move_ss    ( a, b );
00583     return a;   
00584 }
00585

00722         return _mm_and_pd(a, B.d);

00734 //----------------------------------------
00735 // COMONEQ (Condition 12)
00736 //----------------------------------------
00737 
00739 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128d ssp_comoneq_pd_SSE2(__m128d a, __m128d b)
00740 {
00741     __m128d c;
00742     c = _mm_cmpord_pd( a, b );
00743     a = _mm_cmpneq_pd( a, b );
00744     a = _mm_and_pd   ( a, c );
00745     return a;
00746 }
00747 
00749 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128 ssp_comoneq_ps_SSE2(__m128 a, __m128 b)
00750 {
00751     __m128 c;
00752     c = _mm_cmpord_ps( a, b );
00753     a = _mm_cmpneq_ps( a, b );
00754     a = _mm_and_ps   ( a, c );
00755     return a;
00756 }
00757 
00758 
00760 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128d ssp_comoneq_sd_SSE2(__m128d a, __m128d b)
00761 {
00762     __m128d c;
00763     c = _mm_cmpord_pd( a, b );
00764     b = _mm_cmpneq_pd( a, b );
00765     b = _mm_and_pd   ( b, c );
00766     a = _mm_move_sd  ( a, b );
00767     return a;   
00768 }
00769 
00771 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128 ssp_comoneq_ss_SSE2(__m128 a, __m128 b)
00772 {
00773     __m128 c;
00774     c = _mm_cmpord_ps( a, b );
00775     b = _mm_cmpneq_ps( a, b );
00776     b = _mm_and_ps   ( b, c );
00777     a = _mm_move_ss  ( a, b );
00778     return a; 
00779 }

00788 {

00790     c = _mm_cmpgt_epi16( a, b );
00791     a = _mm_cmpeq_epi16( a, b );
00792     a = _mm_or_si128  ( a, c );
00793     return a;
00794 }

00825 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comge_epu16_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00826 {
00827     __m128i mask;
00828     mask = ssp_comge_epi16_SSE2( a, b );         // FFFF where a < b (signed)
00829     mask = ssp_logical_signinvert_16_SSE2( mask, a, b );
00830     return mask;
00831 }

00839     return mask;

00906     a = ssp_comgt_epi64_REF( a, b );
00907     return a;

00911 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comgt_epi8_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00912 {
00913      a = _mm_cmpgt_epi8( a, b );
00914     return a;  
00915 }
00916 
00918 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comgt_epu16_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00919 {
00920     __m128i signMask, mask;
00921 
00922     mask     = _mm_cmpgt_epi16( a, b );              // FFFF where a > b (signed)
00923     signMask = _mm_xor_si128  ( a, b );              // Signbit is 1 where signs differ 
00924     signMask = _mm_srai_epi16 ( signMask, 15 );      // fill all fields with sign bit     
00925     mask     = _mm_xor_si128  ( mask, signMask );    // Invert output where signs differed
00926     return mask;
00927 }
00928 
00930 SSP_FORCEINLINE __m128i ssp_comgt_epu32_SSE2(__m128i a, __m128i b)
00931 {
00932     __m128i signMask, mask;
00933 
00934     mask     = _mm_cmpgt_epi32( a, b );              // FFFF where a < b (signed)
00935     signMask = _mm_xor_si128  ( a, b );              // Signbit is 1 where signs differ 
00936     signMask = _mm_srai_epi32 ( signMask, 31 );      // fill all fields with sign bit     
00937     mask     = _mm_xor_si128  ( mask, signMask );    // Invert output where signs differed
00938     return mask;
00939 }
00940   //TODO:SSE2

00943 {
00944     a = ssp_comgt_epu64_REF( a, b );
00945     return a;
00946 }
